text: Liguria (/lɪˈɡ(j)ʊəriə/, Italian: [liˈɡuːrja]; , [liˈɡyːɾja]) is a region of Northern Italy. The capital is Genoa. The population was about in 2017. == Provinces == * Province of Genoa (capital) * Province of La Spezia * Province of Savona * Province of Imperia == References == == Other websites == *
title: Liguria
